Text: The bill does not infringe on the #2ndAmendment rights of Americans, and it protects human life at the same time. Its passage is a win for responsible gun owners, students, the community, law enforcement, and primary care providers.
Republicans and Democrats negotiated in good faith and agreed on this compromise, and Jack Bergman's opposition defies common ground and common sense.

Today, we reaffirm our commitments to the servicemembers at risk and extend eternal appreciation to all who so willingly gave their last full measure of devotion to our country. #USA
We can't honor the true meaning of Memorial Day without also acknowledging the deepest wounds of combat - far too many of our Nation's vanguard die by suicide.
